resources.string: Come up with something unique, memorable and difficult to guess.
Turn on Touch ID and feel the power of your fingerprint.
Unlock your vault in a second
Recover your account if you forget your master password
Your data will be accessible with any biometric profile registered on this device
You can recover your account by tapping on the button below. Alternatively, if you created a password hint \nearlier, we\'ll email it to you.
By completing this form, you agree to the following terms and conditions: Terms and conditions
Easy to read\nAvoid ambiguous characters, like O, 0, I, l
Easy to say\nJust lowercase and uppercase characters
Welcome to PassVault, the password manager app that helps you keep your passwords safe and secure.Before registering for our service, please read and agree to the following terms and conditions:

1. Registration and Account 
a. To use PassVault, you must register an account with us. You agree to provide accurate and complete information during registration and to keep your account information up to date. 
b. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials, including your username and password. You agree to notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized access to your account. 
c. You agree to use PassVault only for lawful purposes and to comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

2. Security 
a. PassVault uses industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your passwords and personal information. However, you acknowledge that no security system is completely foolproof, and we cannot guarantee the security of your data. 
b. You agree to use PassVault at your own risk and to take reasonable precautions to protect your account and data, such as choosing a strong password and not sharing your account information with others.

3. User Content 
a. You retain ownership of any content you upload to PassVault, such as passwords, notes, and other information. However, you grant PassVault a non-exclusive, royalty-free, worldwide license to use, modify, and distribute your content solely for the purpose of providing our service to you. 
b. You agree not to upload any content that violates any applicable laws or infringes on the rights of others, including intellectual property rights.

4. Termination 
a. You may terminate your PassVault account at any time by contacting us or using the account deletion feature in the app. 
b. We may terminate your account or suspend your access to PassVault at any time, with or without cause, including if we believe that you have violated these terms and conditions.

5. Limitation of Liability 
a. PassVault is provided on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis, without any warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, and non-infringement. 
b. PassVault shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with your use of our service, including but not limited to loss of data or profits, or any other intangible losses.

6. Governing Law 
a. These terms and conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the jurisdiction in which PassVault is located. 
b. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these terms and conditions shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the jurisdiction in which PassVault is located.
\nBy registering for PassVault, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree to these terms and conditions, do not register for our service.
